header.title: Advanced BBCode Box 3 (aka ABBC3) - Add-on : Auto Embed Video From URLs.
header.description:
This file provides instructions to automatically embed video directly from plain URLs.
1) This will automatically embed video from URL links (without [BBvideo] tag). 2) This follows the BBvideo settings in the ACP, so only video sites allowed for the BBvideo tag will be auto-embedded. 3) Limitations: The default height and width settings defined in the ACP for BBvideo will be used on all videos converted this way. Users can not adjust the size like they can when using the BBvideo BBcode. Auto-embedding will only occur on topic pages. This Add-On currently does not work in private messages or signatures. It also does not work on quoted posts.
See the main install file for any additional information about the MOD.
